comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEAC6A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEAC6A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type AC6A model. The model represents field-controlled alternator-rectifier excitation systems with system-supplied electronic voltage regulators.  The maximum output of the regulator, , is a function of terminal voltage, . The field current limiter included in the original model AC6A remains in the 2005 update.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 6.6.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (K).  Typical Value = 536. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (K). Typical Value = 0.173. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd
contents.comment: Demagnetizing factor, a function of exciter alternator reactances (K).  Typical Value = 1.91. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 1.6. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kh
contents.comment: Exciter field current limiter gain (K).  Typical Value = 92. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: seve1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, V, back of commutating reactance (S[V]).  Typical Value = 0.214. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seve2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, V, back of commutating reactance (S[V]).  Typical Value = 0.044. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.086. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 9. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: th
contents.comment: Exciter field current limiter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.08. Default: 0

contents.name: tj
contents.comment: Exciter field current limiter time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: tk
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.18. Default: 0

contents.name: vamax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vamin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve1
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (V) equals V(V).  Typical Value = 7.4. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve2
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (V).  Typical Value = 5.55. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vfelim
contents.comment: Exciter field current limit reference (V).  Typical Value = 19. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vhmax
contents.comment: Maximum field current limiter signal reference (V).  Typical Value = 75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 44. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -36. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
